overview:
Jeff Barber is the head of technology at Red Nova Labs.

Jeff is such an innovative, tireless, madcap character that he begs the question of whether he’s man or big fuzzy futuristic machine. Various degrees from mathematics to computer science can be found crumpled in Jeff’s old files, along with dozens of powerful application models, dissertations, book drafts, and an incomplete symphony. At some point he crossed over to the dark side and taught complex math at the graduate level, but ultimately he was disillusioned by poverty. It took just a bit of persistence to lure him to the light of capitalism.

Jeff lords over RedNova Labs’ technological inventions - including the powerful proprietary tools that speed development for web and mobile connectivity - while the rest of us gawk in awe. Jeff writes compliers, operation systems, 3D game engines, bayesian networks, and AIs, as well as iPhone programs.
